channel.title: Some More Questions for you coders out there :)
channel.description:
well first off, i'm not embaressed by the questions i ask because i might not be very good at coding but still, here are my questions.
1.how do i make it so that accounts are created (for ingame rs) by registering on my forum?
2.i've seen in seom servers, the image around the compass/map, and the text area, you could have a cool diferent style/image/watever u wanna call it, how can i add something like that?
3.how do i make, and put a custom made item into my server? ty
4.can i not make the server public but still edit it and go ingame to see how my servre is coming along?

item.title: Some More Questions for you coders out there :)
item.dc:creator: @WhiteWolves WhiteWolves
item.description:
@WhiteWolves wrote:

well, that’s not really what i ment,

cause i’d like to work on my server before i open it :S

oh yea, is the no-ip thing free forever?

Read full topic
item.source: Some More Questions for you coders out there :)

item.title: Some More Questions for you coders out there :)
item.dc:creator: @jennifer1 jennifer.
item.description:
@jennifer1 wrote:

@ 4.

When I was running my server, I had an extra server that ran on Port 5555 while my other server was on 43594, I did all the bug finding on the Port 5555 server because it became a hassle to go in game and get followed by 20+ people.

If that’s what you mean.

Read full topic
item.source: Some More Questions for you coders out there :)

item.title: Some More Questions for you coders out there :)
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

[code]yes , but you would have to be using another ip, but there is another way weere you can kick everyone and only mods and admins can get on, but i forgot how to do that, and to lazy to refer back[/code]
under welcome message: [code] if.PlayerRights !=0)){ disconnect = true } else { sM("You are staff, therefore You are allowed on") [/code] something like that..

Read full topic
item.source: Some More Questions for you coders out there :)

item.title: Some More Questions for you coders out there :)
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

1.how do i make it so that accounts are created (for ingame rs) by registering on my forum?Mysql

2.i’ve seen in seom servers, the image around the compass/map, and the text area, you could have a cool diferent style/image/watever u wanna call it, how can i add something like that?Client sided custom sprites

3.how do i make, and put a custom made item into my server? Adding models

4.can i not make the server public but still edit it and go ingame to see how my servre is coming along? yes , but you would have to be using another ip, but there is another way weere you can kick everyone and only mods and admins can get on, but i forgot how to do that, and to lazy to refer back

Read full topic
item.source: Some More Questions for you coders out there :)
